physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The proband has a body mass index (BMI) of 22 kg/m2, a C-peptide level of 0.18 nmol/liter, a HbA1c of 8.8%, and a microalbumin to creatinine ratio of 32.9 mg/mmol.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: HbA1c improved to 7.3% after starting continuous sc insulin infusion (CSII) but later deteriorated to 9.3% after 1 year. Exercise duration improved from 7 to 12 minutes after starting coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10).

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated creatinine kinase (CK) and CKMB levels were documented, indicating suspicion of muscle breakdown.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Maximum heart rate of 151 bpm during stress thallium test.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral sensorineural hearing loss was documented, progressive since age 37, with reliance on hearing aids.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hearing tests 1 year after initiating CoQ10 demonstrated no improvement in the rate of hearing decline.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Reported mild numbness and tingling in feet and hands.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Aching muscles reported initially but rarely occurs after starting coenzyme Q10.
